title: Patrick O'Connor from The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: Patrick O'Connor from The Dan Patrick Show
description:
Sports and punk? The idea of both of these mixing may have seemed foreign many years ago but now, not so much. I had Patrick O'Connor on the show this week and he's a sports commentator/co-host on The Dan Patrick show which is arguably one of the most influential sports shows on today, and it's totally DIY. Patrick and I discuss jock mentality, his upbringing in New York/New Jersey and his guidance counselor's horrible advice. Sun Terrace Records and their new release Red Curtain, for fans of Superheaven, Jawbreaker and Basement/a>Visit Casper for the best Mattress you can find for a great price. Enter the code WORDS for a deep discount!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
